alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 3:28PM EST until February 24 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM THURSDAY TO 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches, except 12 to 18 inches over the higher terrain from Negaunee through the Michigamme Highlands to the Huron Mountains. Northeast winds gusting to 35 mph will also create areas of blowing snow, especially in open areas and also in exposed areas near Lake Superior. * WHERE...Baraga and Marquette Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM Thursday to 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
